name: Grimoirus
description:
Okay, the graphics aren't great. You know what is great?

  • Crafting spells by combining up to five of the more than 40 spell elements
  • Playing through 2 adventures, 4 arenas, and 6 gladiatorial events
  • Building your own house, and defending it
  • A second trailer
  • Activating any and all of the 14 modifiers
  • Becoming a unicorn

Six months went into this game. I hope it shows.
